JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Energetic warehouse workers for picking and packing tasks in Kolding
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Energetic warehouse workers for picking and packing tasks in Kolding for period 1/7 – 1/10

BECH Personale is looking for energetic workers, both men and women, for pick and pack tasks in Kolding. The work is on day shift, Monday to Friday and the working hours are from 07:30 – 15:30.

What can you expect?

  • Amazing working place with good colleague
  • 123 kr. per hour
  • Day shifts from kl. 07:30 – 15:30

 

We expect that:

  • You are meeting stable
  • Willing to work with others
  • Can present a criminal record
  • Speak and understand Danish or English

If this sounds like something for you, you are welcome to send us an application on our website www.bechpersonale.dk or on e-mail horsens@bechpersonale.dk. If you have any questions please call - 72 10 85 46. We look forward to hearing form you.
